title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1722.6 - Name of depository to be given
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1722.6 - Name of depository to be given

State Regulations

Where funds are deposited in a bank, the name of the depository must be given; and where mortgage is taken, the
county clerk's office in which it is recorded, with the book and page of
record, should be stated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1722.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
